Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: Norman Osborn
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
CARNAGE SYMBIOTE AND PUMPKIN BOMBS: Red Goblin may start the game with [SVC] #s001 Pumpkin Bombs -or- [SVC] #s004 Carnage Symbiote equipped (at no cost). If you paid 110 points, Red Goblin can equip both and may start the game with both equipped.
THAT'S NORMAN OSBORN IN THE CARNAGE SYMBIOTE!: Steal Energy. // Opposing characters with the Spider-Man Family keyword decreases their d6 roll for Super Senses by -1.
SYMBIOTE ARMOR: Invulnerability. Red Goblin can reduce penetrating damage.
EVERYONE YOU EVER LOVED, PARKER: THEY'RE ALL DEAD!: Exploit Weakness. // When Red Goblin KO's an opposing character, after resolutions opposing characters that share a keyword with the KO'd character modify combat values -1 until your next turn.
Trade Red Goblin Want Red Goblin

Pumpkin Bombs: EQUIP: ANY. UNEQUIP: KO. EFFECT: Energy Explosion with minimum range 4. KNOCKBACK, but only during range attacks. // This character can be given RANGE Destroy actions regardless of their damage value. Light Object# _____________________________________________________________________ Carnage Symbiote: EQUIP: ANY. UNEQUIP: KO. EFFECT: Plasticity, Shape Change. // When this character KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead. Light Object.##
September 19, 2020
nlegore
With Invuln that reduces penatrating damage, the damage he takes doesn't peak at 3 like Invincible. Hit him with 6 or more damage, and you will be doing more than if he had Invincible.

September 9, 2020
AluminumMan
So he decreases every opposing Spider-man Family character's super senses roll, even if he's not the one attacking. That's pretty wicked plus that special damage ability makes this guy a fun terrorizing threat. Not sure why they went with that invulnerability that is almost equivalent to invincibility though.
